flawed_nl_solution:
Miles will read for 144 hours because 24 x (1/6) = <<24*1/6=144>>144
He will read each type for 48 hours because 144 / 3 = 48
He will read 1008 pages of novels because 21 x (48) = 1008
He will read 1440 pages of graphic novels because 30 x (48) = 1440
He will read 2160 pages of comic books because 45 x (48) = 2160
He will read 4608 pages in total because 1008 + 1440 + 2160 = <<1008+1440+2160=4608>>4608

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 144. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
